title: Fallbacks and Degradation
description: A quick, practical guide to Fallbacks and Degradation.

hook.text: The tool is down. The user still needs help. What does your agent do next?

buildup.text: Fallbacks are the safe, predictable paths you take when something failsâ€”timeouts, permissions, missing data, outages.

discovery.text: Define a fallback per failure: ask a clarifying question, return cached info, switch to a cheaper tool, or escalate to a human.

twist.text: The worst UX is silence. Endless retries look like â€œloading foreverâ€ and burn budget while doing it.

climax.text: Test fallbacks on purpose: simulate outages and verify the agent degrades gracefully instead of panicking.

punchline.text: Plan B is part of Plan A.
